name: imap_get_quotaroot
purpose: Retrieve the quota settings per user

return.description:
Returns an array of integer values pertaining to the specified user
   mailbox.  All values contain a key based upon the resource name, and a
   corresponding array with the usage and limit values within.This function will return FALSE in the case of call failure, and an
   array of information about the connection upon an un-parsable response
   from the server.
